overview: Hard Working Twinks These Hard Working Twinks are known for working hard and playing even harder. Whether they are in the workshop or doing their job from the comfort of their own home, there is always someone around to distract them and if truth be known, that's not a hard thing to do! A pretty face, a sensual mouth, a bulging crotch and a peachy ass all collaborate against these working men to lure them away from earning a days wage. Nipples are tweaked, fat cocks are sucked and tight asses are ploughed the only way they can be, and that's bareback. Let's just hope the boss doesn't catch them!
title: Hard Working Twinks
